Management Team

Azam Farooq

Chief Financial Officer

An accomplished financial professional with over 16 years of expertise in financial reporting, operations, budget management, financial planning, due diligence, strategic planning, and liquidity and treasury management. He has held senior finance leadership roles at Jhimpir Power (JCM Power) and Burj Capital, with a focus on renewable energy investments and financial strategy. Known for his strong leadership and ability to guide teams toward operational excellence, Azam has a proven track record of driving efficiency and supporting sustainable organizational growth. Azam holds multiple professional designations, including CPA, FMVA, CICA, and APFA, and has completed his Chartered Accountancy training from the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Pakistan (ICAP).

Pakistan's first Shariah-compliant green energy fund, investing in renewable energy for a sustainable future.
